/usr/local/cuda-12.4/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets --expt-relaxed-constexpr -diag-suppress=20012 -O3 -DNDEBUG --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/test_test_matrix.dir/test_matrix.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/test_test_matrix.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu" -L"/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
